His lord said unto him, Well done, good and faithful servant; thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
He that handleth a matter wisely shall find good: and whoso trusteth in the Lord, happy is he.
The righteous shall be glad in the Lord, and shall trust in him; and all the upright in heart shall glory.
The father of the righteous shall greatly rejoice: and he that begetteth a wise child shall have joy of him.
And whoso believeth in me, and is baptized, the same shall be saved; and they are they who shall inherit the kingdom of God.

verses.text: Verily, I say unto you, I am Jesus Christ, who cometh quickly, in an hour you think not. Even so. Amen.

similars.text: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.
I am afflicted very much: quicken me, O Lord, according unto thy word.
Behold, I speak unto you as if ye were present, and yet ye are not. But behold, Jesus Christ hath shown you unto me, and I know your doing.
Behold, ye fast for strife and debate, and to smite with the fist of wickedness: ye shall not fast as ye do this day, to make your voice to be heard on high.
And saw him saying unto me, Make haste, and get thee quickly out of Jerusalem: for they will not receive thy testimony concerning me.

And now, my brethren, do ye suppose that God justifieth you in this thing? Behold, I say unto you, Nay. But he condemneth you, and if ye persist in these things his judgments must speedily come unto you.
Verily, verily, I say unto you, The hour is coming, and now is, when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God: and they that hear shall live.
And after the sop Satan entered into him. Then said Jesus unto him, That thou doest, do quickly.
Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.
Hold fast the form of sound words, which thou hast heard of me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
